title: Whoops something went wrong! After the recent update

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I opened league today to the login screen where the game said it needed to update and will restart the game. After the games closed a bugsplat opened. Now everytime I try to open league the bugsplat just appears :/ 

help pls ty

replies.body: If you keep getting those bugsplats every time you start up League, there's probably a good chance that something was damaged within the client game files. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the options reinstall and clean uninstall turned on to make sure you get a fresh copy of the game installed. Hit me back up if that doesn't help out much though!

Same issue here. Tried full repair with the Hextech Tool too. Sent a bug report. I don't know what to do either. {{item:3124}}

<Edit> After all the hopeless effort and rage. I figured out that restarting windows fixed it? GG </3
Yes this fucking works. I can finally go spread my cancer

I'm having the exact same problem. Tried solving it with Hextech Repair Tool from r/leagueoflegends. Did a repatch with the tool and nothing came out of it. Problem persisted. Did a fresh reinstall and still got the bugsplat. Funny thing, I was playing League just fine before this Urgot update. What went wrong?

Edit: Ran with administrator, deleted temp files (windows and appdata) and ran in compatibility mode with Windows XP (service 3) both "lol.launcher" and "lol.launcher.admin". Didn't work.

Edit2: Updated my graphics/audio drivers. Did not work.

Edit3: Went to play CSGO. The problem is on Riot's end, bug splat came after Urgot update. Fucking thing sucks.
